languages.text: "Вижу, ты неперевоспитуем{mf||а}, образец. Мои ожидания были выше. Если ты не способ{mf|ен|на} выполнять даже простые команды, нет оснований использовать тебя для чего-то более важного. Я найду тебе более утилитарное применение". {n}Одна из механических конечностей ощетинивается венцом зазубренных крючьев, которые тянутся к вашему лицу, а затем и внутрь вашего лица.{/n}

"I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вижу, ты неперевоспитуем{mf||а}, образец. Мои ожидания были выше. Если ты не способ{mf|ен|на} выполнять даже простые команды, нет оснований использовать тебя для чего-то более важного. Я найду тебе более утилитарное применение". {n}Одна из механических конечностей ощетинивается венцом зазубренных крючьев, которые тянутся к вашему лицу, а затем и внутрь вашего лица.{/n}

"I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. languages.text: 「標本よ、お前は実に救いがたい。私はお前にもっと期待していた。最も単純な命令にすら従えないのならば、お前をもっと重要なことに使う道理などない。より実用的な用途を探すとしよう」{n}彼の機会的な付属器官のひとつには、トゲの付いた針が逆立っている。あなたの顔に、そしてその内側へとそれが差し向けられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「標本よ、お前は実に救いがたい。私はお前にもっと期待していた。最も単純な命令にすら従えないのならば、お前をもっと重要なことに使う道理などない。より実用的な用途を探すとしよう」{n}彼の機会的な付属器官のひとつには、トゲの付いた針が逆立っている。あなたの顔に、そしてその内側へとそれが差し向けられる。{/n}

languages.text: “我看得出来，你是个无可救药的实验对象。我本来对你有更高的期望，但如果你连最简单的命令都执行不了，那我就没必要让你去做更重要的事情了。到时候，我会给你找个更基本的用途。”{n}他伸出了长满钩刺的金属附肢，将它伸向了你的脸，随后刺入了你的血肉之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我看得出来，你是个无可救药的实验样本。我本来对你有更高的期望，但如果你连最简单的命令都执行不了，那我就没必要让你去做更重要的事情了。到时候，我会给你找个更基本的用途。”{n}他伸出了长满钩刺的金属附肢，将它伸向了你的脸，随后刺入了你的血肉之中。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous êtes véritablement incorrigible, spécimen. J'attendais mieux de vous. Si vous n'êtes pas capable de suivre les ordres les plus simples, je ne vois aucune raison de vous utiliser pour un dessein plus important. Je vous trouverai une autre utilité. » {n}L'un de ses appendices mécaniques se hérisse de crochets barbelés qui s'avancent vers votre visage, puis pénètrent dans votre tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes véritablement incorrigible, spécimen. J'attendais mieux de vous. Si vous n'êtes pas capable de suivre les ordres les plus simples, je ne vois aucune raison de vous utiliser pour un dessein plus important. Je vous trouverai une autre utilité. » {n}L'un de ses appendices mécaniques se hérisse de crochets barbelés qui s'avancent vers votre visage, puis pénètrent dans votre tête.{/n}

languages.text: «Veo que lo tuyo no tiene remedio, espécimen. Tenía expectativas más altas que esto. Si eres incapaz de seguir las instrucciones más sencillas de todas, no tiene sentido intentar usarte para algo más importante. Tendré que encontrarte un fin más práctico». {n}Uno de sus apéndices mecánicos saca una corona de ganchos dentados que se acerca a tu cara y se adentra en ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Veo que lo tuyo no tiene remedio, espécimen. Tenía expectativas más altas que esto. Si eres incapaz de seguir las instrucciones más sencillas de todas, no tiene sentido intentar usarte para algo más importante. Tendré que encontrarte un fin más práctico». {n}Uno de sus apéndices mecánicos saca una corona de ganchos dentados que se acerca a tu cara y se adentra en ella.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich sehe, Ihr seid unverbesserlich, Versuchsstück. Ich hatte deutlich höhere Erwartungen an Euch. Wenn Ihr nicht in der Lage seid, einfachste Befehle zu befolgen, gibt es keinen Grund, Euch für etwas Wichtigeres zu benutzen. Ich werde mir eine praktischere Verwendung für Euch überlegen." {n}Eines seiner mechanischen Körperglieder bohrt eine Krone aus spitzen Haken in dein Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

Ich werde mir eine praktischere Verwendung für Euch überlegen." {n}Eines seiner mechanischen Körperglieder bohrt eine Krone aus spitzen Haken in dein Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlaşılan bir türlü iflah olmuyorsun numune. Senden beklentilerim yüksekti. En basit emirleri bile yerine getirmekten acizsen seni daha önemli bir şeylerde kullanmaya çalışmam için bir sebep yok. Senden daha pratik bir şekilde faydalanacağım." {n}İğneli kancalarla dolu mekanik uzuvlarından biri yüzüne yaklaşıyor, ardından kafanın içine giriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I see that you are incorrigible, specimen. My expectations of you were higher than this. If you are incapable of following the simplest of commands, there is no reason to try to use you for something more important. I will find you a more practical application." {n}One of his mechanical appendages bristles with a crown of barbed hooks that reach for your face, then inside it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşılan bir türlü iflah olmuyorsun numune. Sana dair beklentilerim daha fazlaydı. En basit emirleri bile yerine getirmekten acizsen, seni daha önemli bir şeylerde kullanmaya çalışmam için bir sebep yok. Senin için daha pratik bir uygulama alanı ayarlayacağım." {n}İğneli kancalarla dolu mekanik uzuvlarından biri yüzüne yaklaşıyor, ardından kafanın içine giriyor.{/n}
